data.sentence: The word وَهُوَ comes from the root ه و and is associated with the meanings: huwa = He (pronoun. masculine 3rd. sing.)

data.meanings: protect, cover over, shield, forgive, pardon.
data.sentence: The word الْغَفُورُ comes from the root غ ف ر and is associated with the meanings: protect, cover over, shield, forgive, pardon.

data.meanings: to love, wish for, desire, be fond of, will, long.
data.sentence: The word الْوَدُودُ comes from the root و د د and is associated with the meanings: to love, wish for, desire, be fond of, will, long.
